meanings.sent1: The quiet library atmosphere is nondisruptive to students studying.
meanings.sent2: The nondisruptive meeting proceeded smoothly without any interruptions.
meanings.sent3: The nondisruptive cat slept peacefully through the loud thunderstorm.
meanings.sent4: Her nondisruptive presence in the group was like a calming breeze on a hot day.
meanings.sent5: The nondisruptive behavior of the audience made the performance enjoyable for everyone.

meanings.definition: Characterized by a lack of disruption or interruption.
meanings.sent1: The nondisruptive flow of traffic allowed us to reach our destination on time.
meanings.sent2: The nondisruptive workflow in the office led to increased productivity.
meanings.sent3: The nondisruptive movie plot kept the audience engaged till the end.
meanings.sent4: His nondisruptive leadership style ensured harmony among team members.
meanings.sent5: The nondisruptive rhythm of the music created a soothing ambiance in the room.
